price: Namna hivi yanakuwa mateso, na bila ya shaka mateso ya Akhera ni makubwa zaidi, laiti wangeli jua!
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Mfano wa kama hayo yaliyo yasibu hilo shamba ndio inakuwa adhabu yangu ninayo iteremsha duniani kwa anaye stahiki. Na bila ya shaka adhabu ya Akhera ni kubwa zaidi lau kuwa watu wanajua hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kadhālika al-ʿadhābu walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
